Detailed Description

Defines the methods provided by the phy to the mac layer.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MacToPhyInterface::BasePhyMessageKinds

Enumerator:
TX_OVER  Indicates the end of a send transmission.
RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER  Indicates the end of a radio switch.
CHANNEL_SENSE_REQUEST  Channel sense control message between Mac and Phy.
AIR_FRAME  AirFrame kind
LAST_BASE_PHY_KIND  Stores the id on which classes extending BasePhy should continue their own kinds.

virtual int MacToPhyInterface::getRadioState (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns the current state the radio is in. See RadioState for possible values.

This method is mainly used by the mac layer.

Implemented in BasePhyLayer.

Referenced by Mac80211::handleLowerControl(), CSMAMacLayer::handleLowerControl(), Mac80211::handleLowerMsg(), SimpleMacLayer::handleMessage(), CSMAMacLayer::handleSelfMsg(), and CSMAMacLayer::scheduleBackoff().

virtual simtime_t MacToPhyInterface::setRadioState ( int  rs  )  [pure virtual]

Tells the BasePhyLayer to switch to the specified radio state.

The switching process can take some time depending on the specified switching times in the ned file. The return value is the time needed to switch to the specified state, or smaller zero if the radio could not be switched (propably because it is already switching.

Implemented in BasePhyLayer.

Referenced by Mac80211::handleEndContentionTimer(), Mac80211::handleEndSifsTimer(), Mac80211::handleLowerControl(), CSMAMacLayer::handleLowerControl(), SimpleMacLayer::handleMacPkt(), CSMAMacLayer::handleSelfMsg(), SimpleMacLayer::handleTXOver(), and SimpleMacLayer::initialize().
